alert.note: Alert for Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kearny County through 630 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Lakin, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakin and Deerfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
